website_summaries.verdict: This favored teething and drooling bib offers supreme comfort and function while boasting remarkably high ratings.
pros: Highly absorbent, double layered cotton keeps fluid within bib's boundaries
Comes in a pack of eight
Boy and girl designs available for purchase
cons: Some children find the material itchy
Tend to shrink in the wash

customer_reviews.title: The drooling never ends !
customer_reviews.text: Having a baby that had bad reflux in the early months , then straight into teething at 4 months , I have been in constant need of bibs ! Let me tell you, not all bibs are the same ! I bought a lot of cute bibs (not on amazon) and it was a total waste and I had to throw them away since they would become soaking wet within 30 Min. I was literally going through 10 bibs a day and my baby’s clothes would still become damp. These bibs help block the moisture from soaking baby’s clothing because they are a nice thick material. I highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Foreverjaded

customer_reviews.title: Great absorbent, cute bibs
customer_reviews.text: These bandana bibs are so cute! My son is 4 months old, a big drooler, and spits up a lot. We go through a ton of bibs. I bought these because of reviews about how absorbent they are and am so pleased with them. These are the softest, most absorbent, and cutest bibs that we have. We would go through up to 4 or 5 bibs a day at times, but with these 1-2 can last him all day. Highly recommend for anyone who wants a cute and absorbent bib for their messy baby!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay H

customer_reviews.title: Not bad! Cute designs and colors
customer_reviews.text: Not bad! Cute designs and colors. My 14mo drools CONSTANTLY and in amounts that don't seem possible. I'm changing his bibs like 6-7 times a day so getting 8 for this price was SO nice. The only issue I have (and this is for all bandana bibs, not just this brand) is that the fabric folds up right under the chin so when he drools, it soaks the fabric and his chin/cheeks stay wet until I change the bib. I try and change it constantly of course, but it also means I've got to change it sooner for the bandana design. I do like that at least it's made of organic cotton since it's constantly touching his face.
customer_reviews.author: e b

customer_reviews.title: Thin, other brands are better
customer_reviews.text: Just received these in the mail and I am a little disappointed. This is my fourth order of drool bibs from multiple companies, and these are by far the thinnest. Day 1 my little guy went through four of them. Super cute material but NOT worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynae Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: These are the best bibs EVER
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bibs EVER! I'm so glad these became such a popular style. So cute. I've tried a variety of bandana bibs and these are my favorite. Perfect cute and simple designs. The backs snap really easily, and the bibs are tapered/folded/stitched so they wrap around the neck nicely. they are very soft on the bottom and gentle on the neck. the top is really absorbent as well. They hold a ton. My baby slobbers a massive amount, and will soak these bibs, but it soaks through the top, and keeps it dry on the bottom, which is just perfect, so it keeps the baby and outfit dry. I've ordered extra for myself and friends. These are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: mamabear

customer_reviews.title: I'd keep looking...
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is lower quality than the pictures suggest. Backing is nice and thick and feels like it could absorb a lot. Tag look and placement is absolutely obnoxious tho. Planned on returning because of that but there is no option for pick up and my post office is a inconvenient distance. So I'm just going to cut my losses and maybe try removing the tags with a seam ripper :/
customer_reviews.author: lindsey nichols

customer_reviews.title: Cute...but not effective bib.
customer_reviews.text: Other than being cute, I don't think these are great as actual bibs. If you use them for feeding time, be prepared to toss out several of these from food stains. Either that, or you won't want to use them in public afterwards because they look pretty bad. If you're primarily using for a drooling baby, be prepared for constantly changing out the bib and stinky bibs if you don't wash them right away. With my drooling 18month old, the bib is wet within a few minutes after I put it on. If you are still looking for cotton bandanna bibs, you can get the same quality for a little bit cheaper from other sellers.
customer_reviews.author: True

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I'm not so sure about the positive reviews. While the cotton side seems okay, the polyester is likely going to irritate your baby's skin if he/she is sensitive. The seller claims that the polyester side is supposed to protect the drool but it doesn't even do a better job than a pure 100% cotton. Unfortunately, UPS drop off was the only return option and it wasn't worth the drive for me to return. Review the negative reviews before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Yi

customer_reviews.title: Super absorbent and soft!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best drool bibs I’ve ever gotten. Great price for the amount you get as well, haven’t seen anything better. The quality is also fantastic. Very soft, crazy absorbent but they don’t leak through to the back of the bib. My baby drools A LOT and I wanted something that I wouldn’t have to change a few times a day, and I never have to change these throughout the day! They’re also super cute and gender neutral. I’d recommended these to everyone! And would definitely buy again. Great price for the amount and quality you get.
customer_reviews.author: Savanah Walk

customer_reviews.title: I thought I was purchasing another brand that I have been very pleased with. On these
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brand by mistake, I thought I was purchasing another brand that I have been very pleased with. On these, the neck opening is too large, spitup and drool get into neck crease. Washed once and shrunk appx 1" in length.
customer_reviews.author: Cvillekp

customer_reviews.title: Minor differences between KiddyStar and Matimati
customer_reviews.text: I like the patterns of these bibs, and the price is good for a set of 8. However, I have also purchased several packs of the Matimati bibs over the past 2 years, and notice some differences between the brands. The fleece on the back of these bibs is not as thick/absorbent as the fleece used on the Matimati bibs. I've also noticed that the printed fabric gets kinda wrinkly (doesn't lay flat) after laundering. Overall, these are minor complaints, but I thought I would point them out for anyone wondering the differences between the brands.
customer_reviews.author: Catie P.

customer_reviews.title: I love it. My son is teething and has several ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this item twice now. I love it. My son is teething and has several solid meals per day, so these bandana bibs are a great means for keeping his shirt dry. And he looks like a baby cowboy. The only thing to keep in mind is, if you wash these, they will curl upon going through the dryer. It's best to let these air dry. For me, this is not a big deal, so I am giving this 5 stars. I do wish there were more patterns and colors for boys though.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Itchy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my nephew. Very pretty and made very nice however I wouldn't recommend buying these if your child is sensitive to anything. The back lining of polyester fleece itches and caused red blotchy skin. I told my sister to throw away I'd buy different ones for the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Chehovits

customer_reviews.title: Order multiple sets so you don't have to wait!
customer_reviews.text: These have been wonderful to have with our teething, slobbering, chewing 6 month old! They've lasted way longer than the cloth bibs with the velcro, and are more comfortable for our little one than the plastic backed bibs. We love these so much, we've ordered another set! We do wash them in the washer and dry them on a light, gentle cycle and they've retained their shape and absorbency. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: always shopping

customer_reviews.title: We love these! He loves putting them in his mouth ...
customer_reviews.text: We love these! He loves putting them in his mouth and he drools so much that this helps keep his clothes clean. I think they are pretty good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but...
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these bibs. They look super cute on and the material really does a good job at soaking up drool. But after washing (and I followed directions to use vinegar in the first wash and have never put them in the dryer) the shape has changed and they don’t fit well anymore. The first clasp makes it too tight and it rides up on baby’s chin. The second clasp makes it too big and defeats the purpose. Sorry to say I won’t be using these much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for droolers
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore these! My son drools and spits up a LOT, and we go through 15 to 20 bibs in two days. I was finding that every single picture we had of him, he was wearing a bib that distracted from the cuteness. I was a little skeptical of these because I was afraid they would soak through and still get his clothes wet, but I've been pleasantly surprised. They aren't waterproof, but they are highly absorbent and the material that is up against his clothes doesn't tend to be soaking wet. This translates to his clothes staying pretty dry all day long! Plus, they look super cute in pictures!
customer_reviews.author: B. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: The size fits a 4 year olds neck that is about 11-12 inches
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product for my 4 year old son to cover his trache stoma. He came off the ventilator and they took his breathing tube out a few months ago. This is a great alternative to the trache ties. I wish both sides were cotton though. But its okay for now. I referred the other Moms of babies with the same situation we are in. Hope they go on the website and check it out.
customer_reviews.author: Consuelo Lalunio

customer_reviews.title: Cute but...
customer_reviews.text: Cute but bunch up under my baby's chin and worries me that she doesn't get proper air flow - I keep contemplating how I can alter these so that there isn't so much fabric in front. While the back does stay dry, the front seems to get wet very quickly and causes irritation under my baby's chin. Also find it annoying that they are to be laid flat to dry. After the first wash I put them in the dryer because I don't have space or time to wait for my bibs to dry this way.
customer_reviews.author: tlambergTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for the cheap price
customer_reviews.text: These are great to have when you have a baby who drools none stop. Decent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Micker

customer_reviews.title: Cute but unless!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute but doesn't hold drool. .Within 10 min, my 4 month old's shirt was SOAKING wet. He is teething and it's just awful. I am so frustrated with these. See images below. If you want bandana bibs, go with Matimati Baby, they hold everything in!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your self on laundry!
customer_reviews.text: A - My kid looks super cute in these B - They save you a ton of laundry! My son has been known to spit up a time or two, and these will really save you. Sure you may not catch it 100% of the time, but they deff catch a lot more often than not, and can save us a cloths change or 4!
customer_reviews.author: pcpeggs

customer_reviews.title: Best Bibs
customer_reviews.text: I love these bibs and use them as part of my drooly baby boy's outfits. They always look nice, are very absorbent and wash very well. I don't follow the washing instructions and just throw them in with the rest of the laundry and have had no issues. I bought my second set just b/c I love having extras in the diaper bag when the drool is out of control. They are super soft and comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Does allow moisture through to clothes but that's after being pretty saturated. Would have rated higher but one arrived ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and work well. Does allow moisture through to clothes but that's after being pretty saturated. Would have rated higher but one arrived with a hole in the cotton layer.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of bibs I’ve purchased from this brand. I purchased more because I loved them so much and wanted more styles to choose from. They soak up teething drool remarkably well and ALWAYS keep my son’s shirt dry (even after he wears the same bib all day long.) I recommend these bibs to all of my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Our little guy spits up a lot so ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Our little guy spits up a lot so if he's going to have to wear a bib at all times, I'm happy it's stylish. I like these because they are wider then a lot of the other brands and cover out to his shoulders and down his chest halfway. It's saved me from several outfit changes for sure. The material is also really thick so even if he soaks the bib, rarely does he get his shirt wet. Great product, would defiitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tot Tots

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!! My son is a heavy drooler and teething hard and these keep himself and his clothes nice and dry! He also has eczema and before we got these we were using 6+ bibs a day and they were soaking through his shirts and he would have severe eczema all over his chest. Ever since we began using these hid eczema has gone away! Would recommend these to any parent that has kids with skin problems or are heavy droolers! I would love more in different patterns if available!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonobsessedmom

customer_reviews.title: Best drool bibs out there!
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are the greatest I have ever owned! First of all they are super cute. Beyond that they are great quality. I have washed (and air-dried) them many times and they still look like new. The fabric is soft, and can hold a lot of drool before feeling damp. My son loves chewing on them, and they are just the right size that they don't overwhelm him. They don't trap moisture against the baby's skin, which has caused rashes with other bibs in the past. There are 2 sets of snaps on the back, so they can be adjusted to different sizes. I would definitely recommend these bibs, they are a great value for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: These things are wonderful! great absorbance top layer and keeps dry under ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are wonderful! great absorbance top layer and keeps dry under layer. adjustable snaps are great, will not scratch skin like velcro bibs. It hold a lot of fluid, does not leak, or dip when soaked. Heavy thickness but light weight. Love it! The colors are okay, but I prefer solids, could not find any.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra B.

customer_reviews.title: Essential Baby Item
customer_reviews.text: I really love these bibs....they save me a lot of trouble and outfit-changing. They don't wash super great....come out kind of wrinkly and slightly shrunk up, the dark blue color faded....but nowhere near a deal-breaker for me. I would order again in a heartbeat, wish I had them a long time ago. Colors are the cutest I've seen in this style, please keep this color group! I might need to order more : )
customer_reviews.author: KYSER

customer_reviews.title: 1,000 washes later they are still awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Fit my newborn and my now 8 month old very well. Kinda need to tuck under the chin for younger babies but they are great! Super soft and easy to clean. I can’t say enough great things about them! No fraying. No issues with the clasps. No color bleeding. Just an overall genius quality product!
customer_reviews.author: JenniferTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great bibs and very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and great quality. My son goes through 10 bibs a day. These bibs have good absorbency but it still gets soaked on the top layer. It holds up pretty good so that the back layer stays pretty dry so it doesn't get your babies clothes wet. I have a bunch of the muslin bibs by aden and anais and those soak all the way through very quickly and it leaves my sons collar all wet.
customer_reviews.author: Jxchong

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and very absorbant. I put them all in the washing machine before reading the instructions to wash cold and dry flat, so I was worried but they came out fine in the normal wash. There are only two snaps so two sizes you can adjust to and my kid is in the middle, but it's not a big deal to have it loose. The top layer feels like thicker cotton, a little tough but smooth, and the bottom layer is like thin fleece.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these bibs! My son drools and spits up a lot so I was hesitant on whether or not the bibs would keep his chest dry. I've tried a lot of different bibs and none of them can keep up with him. These bibs are amazing! They absorb the wetness and he's yet to have a wet shirt! The bibs have cute designs and are stylish. I'm definitely ordering more and will be replacing all of my son's bibs with these!
customer_reviews.author: SmrtyPntsLB

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these!! Don't buy any other drool bib. There are others out there that may seem cheaper, they have Velcro and aren't near the quality of these. I got Kiddy Star as a baby gift for my now 5 month old, and also other Velcro ones. I won't even use the Velcro ones, and I ordered more Kiddy star because they are so great. The snaps are adjustable and are the number 1 reason this product is so great. My baby drools like crazy and his shirts remain dry with these fantastic bibs.
customer_reviews.author: Elzabeth Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Polyester backing, not certified organic
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these are really organic. The patterns are nice. They are a bit thick and uncomfortable for summer. They also don't lay very flat. A lot of Amazon sellers falsely advertise organic cotton, I'm suspicious that this could be one them. Polyester backing is not very nice. Why is it so hard to find plain, organic cotton bibs?
customer_reviews.author: LVM

customer_reviews.title: We love these bibs
customer_reviews.text: We love these bibs! They're perfect for drooling babies! I've noticed that even if they become soaked my little one's clothes stay dry. I would recommend these to anyone with a teething baby! The patterns are all really cute too. They go with all of my LO's outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Askew Fanguy

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bibs for my little man. My only complaint is that after you wash them it takes away from how soft it originally felt. It becomes a little fuzzy. I'm big about textures and it bothers me. I feel like it will get rougher/worse over time. But overall, I'm satisfied with how cute they are and the designs offered.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Deshotel

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, cute print adjustable snaps!
customer_reviews.text: They’re super soft! Softer than ones I previously purchased on amazon. Also bonus that they snap on so baby can’t pull it off. 2 snaps on each side so it’s pretty adjustable for various neck sizes. Cute prints. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: marisa

customer_reviews.title: cute colors. They are bigger than the other bandana ...
customer_reviews.text: cute colors. They are bigger than the other bandana bibs we have purchased. Our twins are 10 months and the boy wears one of these all day. These bibs last him all day. We take it off and hang it up during naps to dry a little bit. Run colors and the dual snaps allow for lots of different neck sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Bayless

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: The bibs are cute and made of quality material. I thought they would help keep clothes dry. Instead, they absorb all the moisture and remain soaked after a few minutes of use. Even after being freshly cleaned, as soon as they get wet, they smell like mildew and cause clothes to smell the same. I’ll be ordering another brand that is absorbent. The point was to create less laundry and now I’m just using more bibs instead of changing clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Rivas

customer_reviews.title: I got these for my 5 mo because she is ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 5 mo because she is a drooly beast with her first teeth coming in. The other bibs we have would soak through to her shirt so fast she would need 3 or 4 bibs a day. She sometimes will go through 2 bibs a day with these, but the little rash she had from drool going down her chin has cleared with these. They are really soft and absorbent and she cannot pull them off because there is a snap closure. If we need more bibs in the future, I will be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Reed

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: These are cute bibs. The snaps are quite stiff but maybe those will soften up. After I bought these for my 4 month old infant my pediatrician instructed me to only use cotton against my babies skin, no fleece so I can't use these with the fleece backing. Already washed them so can't return. I also found the washing instructions really odd - 1st wash with white vinegar to prevent color leaching and then who is going to iron a baby bib after drying it?
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Super absorbent!! & Cute
customer_reviews.text: These bibs soak up drool extremely well!!! My little guy is like a faucet most days, he was getting awful drool rash.. A friend suggested these bibs - and I am SO HAPPY! His neck is staying dry and he looks super cute too :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: So soft and great for eating, teething/drool, or just a cute accessory. My kids are toddlers now and still use these bibs for meal time
customer_reviews.author: Jcc

customer_reviews.title: Adorable bibs
customer_reviews.text: The bibs are cute but babies have not been born yet!
customer_reviews.author: Reba

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors, good fabric!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bandanas. They are pretty, and the colors are wonderful. They are thick and stop all the saliva from getting to my babies clothes (unlike my other ones). I must mention, they have a soft and warm inside layer which might be a bit hot in the summer, but now for winter it is more than perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Yael

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy! Soft enough to be gentle on ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfy! Soft enough to be gentle on delicate necks and chins, and no crinkling noise, but they still seem to keep my son dry. He is not as big a spitter as our daughter was, so these may not be up to the toughest jobs, but he still spits up multiple times after every feeding, and these are doing the job in style.
customer_reviews.author: Julia S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute patterns.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. They have a soft cotton material to the back. They have held up to the wash. I like the triangle shape. I bought these to catch my newborn babies spit up and save me from changing him so often. My newborn loves to punch and throw his arms around. The shape allows the fabric to stay down and not end up over his face.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree H

customer_reviews.title: Don't do the job
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was happy about this product because they didn't look like bibs and had snaps instead of Velcro. However, these bibs shrunk on the first wash and now come up over my son's mouth. This causes him to chew or suck on the fabric causing more drooling. I do not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bibdana baby
customer_reviews.text: Love these bib bandanas! (Or as we call them, bibdanas.) They are cute, the snaps are secure and they are super soft. Most importantly, they are absorbent. My son likes to chew on them, and is just super drooly, but these handle that and wash up beautifully. I've already bought another set and can't rave about these enough!
customer_reviews.author: Melaina Lara

customer_reviews.title: Would be thick for summer babies but good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Would be thick for summer babies but I like the fact that it's 100% cotton for the baby faced side and that it doesn't soak your babies chest. Also, the designs go along with almost any outfit. In my picture the color of the bandana is a bit faded. I think the blue and sky blue colors fade pretty easily but others are fine.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Super absorbent bibs that don’t soak thru to my sons ...
customer_reviews.text: Super absorbent bibs that don’t soak thru to my sons shirt. He drools constantly and these are functional but also super cute. We get compliments everywhere we go
customer_reviews.author: LuckyD

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had these for my older son!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for drooly babies! So much more stylish than a regular bib. I've ordered several packs now since we go through so many of them, they wash well and I always get compliments on the cute designs.
customer_reviews.author: krisalicious

customer_reviews.title: soft, absorbent...and it stays on!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I bought them for my baby but have been using them for my drooling tot as well. They are snap closure which is awesome because they STAY ON! They seem soft and comfortable, the kiddo doesn't tear it off. The patterns are cute too. I would totally buy again (or buy for an expecting parent).
customer_reviews.author: J. Zarek

customer_reviews.title: KiddyStar bandanas are the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: After receiving my first set of KiddyStar bandanas, I purchased two more. My grandson has bee n cutting teeth and not only are these bandanas adorable, they absorb and wash up nicely! The materials used are very soft and well made...I just can’t say enough about these bandanas, except you will not be disappointed! Both my daughter-in-laws love these bandanas as well...absolutely a five star product! Thanks KiddyStar for making an exceptional product!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best Bibs you’ll ever buy!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these bibs for our first born child to help keep his onesie dry while he drooled and spit up. They are WONDERFUL!! One of the best purchases we’ve made. There’s no Velcro that hurts his neck and the material so super soft!!
customer_reviews.author: CDB

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST bibs rags. We’ve bought 2 sets and the matching bibs. They are super soft and absorbant. The snaps are easy to put on and take off and don’t snag in the laundry. Best bibs and rags we’ve found!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Parque

customer_reviews.title: I love these bibs they actually seem comfortable for my baby ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these bibs they actually seem comfortable for my baby to wear and definitely protects him from getting wet. The only thing I would change is probably the size... wish they were longer they're too short for my big drooling baby
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Quality and style
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bibs because my cousin and uncle recommended them to me. I’m due in two weeks and decided to stock up on some great quality bibs for my son’s arrival. I am impressed by the quality. They are so soft and beautiful. I love the colors and patterns. I can’t wait to see my little guy rocking these stylish bibs. As for performance I can only speak on behalf of my cousin who is obsessed with them! They hold up great in the wash and really work. They keep her son dry and clean from food and spit up.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Tavares

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent and good for hours of wear even with a heavy drooler ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very soft backing. Organic cotton front. Absorbent and good for hours of wear even with a heavy drooler (teething). Prevents a rash on chest from excess drool. Keeps baby dry. Adorable prints. Good quality. Machine wash, Cons: Hang to dry (in my opinion this is not a con unless you forget to do the wash and need one immediately!)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Super absorbant, stylish, affordable. Mom's new FAVORITE!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these Bibs!!! I have bought so many different brands and I have to say these are the best. My baby boy drools so much, I used to have to change his bib 3-4 times x day, with these 1 or twice max. The are super absorbant. I would highly recommend these even as a gift to someone they are perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient
customer_reviews.text: These are so handy! Especially for feedings right before you plan to leave the house. There have been so many times where I get my son dressed and ready to leave the house after he's eaten...and just as we are ready to walk out the door he spits up (a LOT) and we have to do an outfit change. Now I use these bandana bibs and save a lot of time...and cut back on extra laundry. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and practical
customer_reviews.text: Very soft. Two snaps in back for adjustable size. We go through 2-3 a day with our teething baby. I like them better than regular Velcro bibs because they don’t irritate the back of the neck and they are more stylish and fun to coordinate with outfits! We love love these bandanas.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer444

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They're soft, adjustable in size, & work perfectly for catching my little teething babies drool (no more wet shirt collars! Lol) They had a lot of color/design varieties to choose from. We will definitely be ordering from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: GOTS top layer, fleece underside, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very adorable! GOTS certified fabric on top layer but underside is polyester/fleece which is not so good. My baby is 6.5 months and fits perfect on the small setting.
customer_reviews.author: Organic Turtles

customer_reviews.title: Cute and help to keep dry
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute but stain really easily. Not sure why they stain more than others but I have some from Aiden and Anais and Little Unicorn and never had those stain but these I have only had my 18 month old wear once and they each were stained. In general though, they are very cute and actually do a good job of keeping my son dry with his constant drooling from the fleece backing. They lay well on his neck and arent too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: SeaC

customer_reviews.title: Do not dry!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ruined them after first wash by throwing them on low heat in the dryer. The back side shrunk and they are deformed now. Leaving this rating as a warning to others to listen when it says not to dry. My stupid mistake now made me waste my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: These do not soak through on the clothes, it’s amazing and the patterns are so cute! I love the neutrals but the blues in this are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Avila

customer_reviews.title: Super absorbent bibs!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much I’m about to order another set. They are super absorbent and so cute! I recommend these over the regular bibs. My only suggestion is that they start making holiday bibs and bibs that have cute quotes! :) I would buy them over the standard bibs, any day!
customer_reviews.author: NDSR

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these!! My little one drooled a lot when teeth started coming in. These were a life saver because I could change these easily rather than changing clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: These are adorable and wash well
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable and wash well. We send them on our baby to daycare because they can't always immediately wipe his drool and we do t want his clothing getting soaked. Cute patterns and super thick— the wetness won't get on your babies chest. We have to change it so his chin and face don't get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Prof mommy

customer_reviews.title: They are so stylish and so soft and I love the metal clasps
customer_reviews.text: I only wish they had these 5 years ago when i had my first son. They are so stylish and so soft and I love the metal clasps. Velcro always irritated my son's neck. These are awesome
customer_reviews.author: akedy

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up from dad
customer_reviews.text: This was our first time trying any kind of bandana bibs and we love them! I put one on our son before my husband got home and he saw he bib was wet and was going to change his bib and shirt. He was shocked to discover his shirt was dry and the bib was only wet on top. He came and found me asking where I bought these and if we could get more. They are cute and functional and as a parent that's what you shoot for!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bibs!
customer_reviews.text: I received the first pack of these as a baby shower gift and I loved them so much I had to order more! They are adjustable so they catch ALL the drool from my teething baby whereas other bibs are not tight enough and the drool runs down his neck and onto his clothes. I highly recommend them! They are also extremely soft and continue to stay soft wash after wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Talley

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!!!
customer_reviews.text: We really love these bibs. My son is 3 months old and we use both snaps so it fits well around his neck. The material is super soft and washes well. He loves to suck on his hands and with the bandana style he can do that without his hands being caught on the material of the bib. He drools constantly and these bibs absorb the liquid and dry quickly so the bib isn't soaken wet. I don't know if they come in solid colors but I would buy another set in solid colors so that they match outfits better because he wears them all day long. (never while sleeping!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute. My sons stain some but I believe it depends on how you take care of your clothing and stains.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Korth

customer_reviews.title: I love these bibs
customer_reviews.text: I love these bibs! The colors haven't faded after more than once wash (that's happened to me with other brands in the past) and I even accidentally put one the dryer and still no fading. They keep my toddler's chest completely dry and are adorable! I would absolutely recommend this product (I've bought from a lot of different companies in the past but finally found my go to)!
customer_reviews.author: Kolby Hodge

customer_reviews.title: ... buy these stylish bibs that make him look more like a big boy
customer_reviews.text: My almost 2 year old keeps getting his shirts wet so I decided to buy these stylish bibs that make him look more like a big boy. I know everybody sees their kids like the most beautiful things to have walked on earth, so here I am delighted with mine 😊
customer_reviews.author: Vega

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not the one
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but my lil one has acid reflux. He spit up once and it soaked through. The positive being he didn't get as wet like he normally does. They didn't work for us but maybe for someone else
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette C.

customer_reviews.title: These bandana bibs come in adorable prints, as shown in the product photo
customer_reviews.text: These bandana bibs come in adorable prints, as shown in the product photo. They are well made and fit comfortably on my five month old who is currently teething and therefore drooling all the time! I do wish they had more ripple action, but they are much better than the flat bibs I was using beforehand. Great price and quality!
customer_reviews.author: hmioannou

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand! I've bought 3 sets of these bibs and tried a different brand and by far these are the best. They are a little thin but don't soak through with baby drool, which is great! I would keep buying if they had more sets!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: they are great and adjustable so they fit his neck perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my 14 month old son, they are great and adjustable so they fit his neck perfectly. I tried in the past other brands with Velcro and they left his neck all red and scratchy. Those are nice and soft and the snaps are strong so he can't pull it off
customer_reviews.author: KatieA

customer_reviews.title: Keeps clothes dry
customer_reviews.text: These are very thick so my baby’s outfit doesn’t get wet. They are also very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. I got these for my infant to wear as a stylish bib. They are soft, absorb the drool and look so great. This is my second purchase. I loved them so much I had to get more. They are very well made and do not get ruined in the wash. I highly recommend these for your stylish baby!
customer_reviews.author: Shoelover

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: Not only are these bibs super soft, they wash so well! They look adorable on my 5-month-old son, and the double snap in the back will allow the bibs to grow with him. Cotton bandanna bibs are expensive so getting 8 for this price was a great deal! Very happy with this purchase and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: They really keep the baby & clothes dry and look adorable.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bibs. My grandson is teething and they really keep his clothes and chest dry. They are cute on him as well. I bought two sets so we wouldn't run out before laundry day.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: ... from these bibs and was pleasantly surprised by how nice they are
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what to expect from these bibs and was pleasantly surprised by how nice they are! They have a very soft fabric on the underside of the bib and they are very absorbent! They work great for drool and light spit up. I am completely satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jess L.

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!!!
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are adorable and super soft! They are a baby shower gift for my first grandchild so they have not been used yet but I'm sure they will be perfect for the new baby!
customer_reviews.author: Pattirisha

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are great! The prints are trendy, the fabric is extremely soft which is perfect for my baby's extra sensitive skin. They also hold drool well. I've bought several brands of bandana bibs and these are by far my favorite for all of the above reasons, I will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Mouse

customer_reviews.title: such great quality! really luxurious texture and very absorbent
customer_reviews.text: such great quality! really luxurious texture and very absorbent. the bibs come in really stylish prints too so they dont look caricture-ish when u put them on the baby like other bibs do.
customer_reviews.author: ZMoney

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical but It turned out great!
customer_reviews.text: These work great and really last all day! Our 9 month old is teething and drooling so much but these bibs are fantastic. And the way the bandana folds a few times under the chin really helps catch all the drool. I feel like the price was a great deal for how well these work and the fact that you get 8 in a pack! Love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bibs!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these babes. The two sets of snaps make them adjustable which is nice. They are super absorbent and very soft on the back side. The bandanna shape makes it so that he doesn't flip them up every time he moves his arms
customer_reviews.author: KMS

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and functional
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these little bibdanas! They are super cute and super soft. Two snaps on the back so they are semi-adjustable and they work perfectly. My little one has taken to non stop drooling and spitting as her teeth start to come in and these are real shirt savers. Bonus: they are the perfect place to clip the pacifier! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sharissadove

customer_reviews.title: Best bibs ever
customer_reviews.text: Great bibs. I love the snaps behind the neck. Will never buy velcro again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and soft, but not thick enough
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking bibs. Soft and natural. Wish they were a bit thicker as drool or formula soaks up faster than my other bibs. Maybe make them bigger and just give us 5. Otherwise a good product.
customer_reviews.author: LeaC

customer_reviews.title: These work great! Several reviews say they soak through- I’m sure ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great! Several reviews say they soak through- I’m sure they will with heavy droolers but we haven’t had any wet necklines since we started using. They are soft and seem comfortable for the little guy (4mo). I like the snaps- they don’t wear out and they don’t stick to everything in the dryer like Velcro does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bibs!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because our other ones kept soaking through with her formula and ruining our newborn's clothes. These work great, the front has been soaked while nothing absorbs through the bib to her clothes. They also adjust perfectly to fit her neck at 6 weeks old on the smallest snap adjustment. Plus they're stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Laura W

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: I love these bibs for my son. He is 18 months and still drools like crazy. These have a felt underside and protect his clothes and his chest from getting wet, not to mention look stylish. The darks do fade in the wash but every brand I've gotten fades so I won't take off any starts for that.
customer_reviews.author: APC

customer_reviews.title: Nice bib set
customer_reviews.text: Love these bibs. My baby looks great in them and because he is teething his neck area gets super wet so this does a great job at holding all his saliva. Everyone who sees him with the bib(s) on compliments that he looks cute wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Bounmee Kanthathin

product_meta.title: Baby Bandana Drool Bibs, Unisex 8-Pack Gift Set for Drooling and Teething, Organic Cotton, Soft and Absorbent, Hypoallergenic - for Boys and Girls by KiddyStar (8 Pack)
feature_bullets: PACK OF 8 BABY BANDANA BIBS – Baby Drooling can be annoying not only for the babies (wetness) but for parents too (frequent changing of clothes), however, it’s time to be happy than being irritated as it’s an indication that the salivary glands of your creation, your baby, have started working well! KIDDY STAR Bandana Bibs come in a set of 8 pieces and makes life a lot easier & worry-free for you as it’s much more convenient to change and wash a bandana bib than a dress!

SMART MOISTURE MANAGEMENT - The double layered design of our bandana baby bibs helps in intelligent moisture management - the front layer is made up of 100% cotton which has high absorption capacity to restrict any fluid from crossing the bib’s boundaries. The back side has a polyester fleece which resists moisture and prevents it from passing through to your baby’s clothes - thus helping him/her stay dry all the time.

NON-ALLERGIC, ADJUSTABLE SIZE AND BEAUTIFUL PRINTS - Each baby bib Bandana comes with 2 Nickel-Free snap closures - the presence of nickel poses the risk of allergic reactions to baby’s sensitive skin and should therefore be avoided. The snap closures allow you to adjust the size of the bandana drool bibs to let it be a perfect fit all the time while your baby grows form 0 to 24 months. The bibs come in unique and beautiful prints - making these ideal bandana bibs for boys or girls.

USEFUL BABY SHOWER GIFT – Every mother is going to love this thoughtful gift as it not only helps take better care of the baby but also reduces the work for the new mother – easier to change the bibs than clothes. The unique design ensures that the baby’s dress is not fully covered rather its look is enhanced for better. Moreover, the superior quality fabric also ensures that the bibs remain new-like even after several wash cycles. Certainly one of the best baby shower gifts!

100% RISK-FREE SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – We also offer you 100% Risk-Free Satisfaction Guarantee to let you buy with confidence; no questions asked. However, we are quite sure that you will be super-impressed with our baby bandana drool bibs for their effectiveness in protecting your baby’s cloth from drools, dribbles, spit ups, etc., their soft and comfortable fabric, adjustable design and beautiful prints, and will love yourselves for the decision of buying the set.
